clothconfig.plasmovoice.advanced.camera_:
Sets the sound listener to the camera entity.
The sound listener determines the position in the world from which you hear audio. For example, if you're using freecam and this option is disabled, you'll hear audio as if you were not in freecam.

On some servers, this may be disabled by pv.allow_freecam permission.
clothconfig.plasmovoice.devices.use_java: Sometimes OpenAL input device doesn't work properly on some systems, so you can try to use Javax implementation.
gui.plasmovoice.about.copyright: Please use only official sources and don’t redistribute the mod without our permission. You can contact us on Discord for any questions, help, suggestions, or offers.
gui.plasmovoice.advanced.adaptive_jitter:
Time-based network jitter buffer with adaptive delay depending on connection quality.

Try to enable this option if you hear audio artifacts caused by bad connection.
gui.plasmovoice.advanced.directional_sou:
An angle in which you will hear the source at 100% if directional sources option is enabled.

360 is like if the option is disabled.
gui.plasmovoice.advanced.mute_player_on_: When enabled, the player's source will be automatically muted if the direct source from the same player becomes active. Use this to avoid overlapping audio or conflicting playback from multiple sources.
gui.plasmovoice.advanced.stereo_sources_:
Addons use stereo sources for better audio quality. The quality is much better, but facing doesn't affect the panning. Sound only fades out with distance.

When this option is enabled, stereo sources are converted to the usual mono sources. Quality is worse, but they will now have panning.
gui.plasmovoice.cannot_connect_to_udp:
Can't connect to the UDP server,
It's likely that the UDP port is closed. Read wiki:
%s
gui.plasmovoice.devices.activation_thres:
Only relevant if the activation type is set to “Voice activation”.

Move the slider to a point where volume only surpasses it when you are talking.

You can also press the icon to enable microphone testing and hear your voice
gui.plasmovoice.devices.directional_sour:
Will make the sound slightly quieter if the sound source is not looking directly at you, and is outside of the specified angle.

Applies to the players you hear.
gui.plasmovoice.devices.hrtf.tooltip:
Improves accuracy of audio positioning, making it easier to understand where the sound is coming from in 3D space.

May slightly make the audio quality worse.

Applies to the players you hear.
gui.plasmovoice.devices.noise_suppressio:
RNNoise noise suppression.

Uses neural networks. Works great, but may be CPU intensive.

Applies to your microphone.
gui.plasmovoice.devices.occlusion.toolti:
Casts a ray from the player to each sound source, and muffles the sound if blocks are in the way.

Useful if you don’t want to hear people from the other rooms, but sometimes doesn’t work properly, so it’s better to keep it disabled when you don’t need it.
gui.plasmovoice.devices.stereo_capture.t:
Captures sound in stereo, then converts it to mono.
May improve quality, but makes the sound quieter.
gui.plasmovoice.devices.volume.tooltip: Turning volume to more than 100% may cause distortion.
gui.plasmovoice.not_available: Plasmo Voice is not installed on this server
gui.plasmovoice.overlay.style.name: Only Name
gui.plasmovoice.title: %1$s %2$s Settings
message.plasmovoice.macos_incompatible_l: You can't use microphone because your Minecraft Launcher doesn't support microphone permissions on MacOS. You should switch to %s.
message.plasmovoice.update_available: New version %1$s of Plasmo Voice is available: %2$s
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.plasmovoi: A proximity voice chat mod with audio positioning and lots of features
modmenu.summaryTranslation.plasmovoice: A proximity voice chat mod with audio positioning and lots of features
